reviews.review: she’s a good professor (very fair grader, always willing to work with you), but the class overall felt so useless. the group project part of the better half of the semester felt super unnecessary and was generally not a fun experience. all of the parts of the group project definitely could’ve just been individual assignments. in general, your grade is based on the assignments (no tests or quizzes). if you have the option to take her for fire120, i'd do it.
